pkgmetadata.longdescription: Understanding Suppression of HIV // Analyzes longitudinal data of HIV decline in patients on antiretroviral therapy using the canonical biphasic exponential decay model (pioneered, for example, by work in Perelson et al. (1997) doi:10.1038/387188a0; and Wu and Ding (1999) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.1999.00410.x). Model fitting and parameter estimation are performed, with additional options to calculate the time to viral suppression. Plotting and summary tools are also provided for fast assessment of model results.
